translation_credits: Put your name here on your respective language's file if you've translated!

error.placeholder: This feature has not been implemented yet!
error.botbanned: You cannot use the bot as you have been bot banned!

message.deleted: This message has already been deleted!

invalid.title: Invalid Message ID!
invalid.description: Make sure the message hasn't been deleted and that it can be fetched.

message.no_author: The author of this message could not be found!

no_results.title: No results found!
no_results.description: No results were found for %TEXTURENAME%. Have you made a typo?

no_image.title: Image not found!
no_image.description: `%TEXTURENAME%` hasn't been made for %PACK% in version %VERSION% yet or is ignored!

invalid_choice.title: Invalid choice!
invalid_choice.description: `%CHOICE%` is not a valid keyword! Have you made a typo?

image.max_size: The maximum size for an image is 1024x1024px.
image.max_length: The maximum length for a tilesheet is 32 frames.
image.suggestion: Make sure you uploaded an image, replied to a valid image, used a valid image URL, or are in the correct channel.

error.command: One of my developers made an error while making this command! Don't worry, the error is not on your side. Please contact <@360249987927638016>, <@473860522710794250>, or <@173336582265241601> if this keeps occurring.
error.polls_removed: CompliBot polls have been made redundant by the native Discord feature and have thus been removed.

permission.notice: You don't have permission to do that!
